page.title: 20A Motorway Poem.
page.content:
{The lead man is shouting instruction {The men are all making destruction {The digger looks like a caterpillar {And the road looks like a river. The M25 is always alive With loads of disruptive machines Munching,crunching;its so disrupting{ They look like a bunch of old fiends. {I hate the muck from the dumper truck {I really don't like it at all {The noise it makes is a big disgrace {It could be our downfall. You can hear hammering and chattering Even when the day is done I hear their shouts and have my doubts I reckon they made it for fun!
by N.Paterson (10 yrs) { {The M25 is being constructed through {the Shoreham valley despite protests. {It is part of the London Orbital Road.
